thread.title: Richard & Frances
thread.title_full: R&G Brenner Income Tax reviewed by Richard & Frances

author: Richard & Frances
title: Richard & Frances
text: Linda has always been there for us. I first met her through my wife who been using Linda to do her taxes 28 years ago. She is always greets you with a smile and very professional about her job. Honestly, we would not think of going to any other person!
